Property.name: maxFragCount
Property.HelpText: The total number of allowed transparent fragments to be OIT-sorted per pixel. The Dreamcast uses 32. The higher the number, the more video memory is required. GPU horsepower is a must. At 1080p, 32 fragments per pixel requires an ADDITIONAL 1GB of video memory!

Property.name: allowDepth32
Property.HelpText: Allows for a higher precision depth buffer at the potential cost of performance.
